articles.title: Cathie Wood Sells More Tesla Stock. Q4 Deliveries Loom But The Market May Not Care.

articles.summary: Investor's Business Daily: Cathie Wood Sells More Tesla Stock. Q4 Deliveries Loom But The Market May Not Care.. Cathie Wood's Ark Invest is shifting money into crypto, even as Tesla stock hits highs on market bets for self-driving, shrugging off deliveries. Related tickers mentioned: TSLA.
